NewsletterPrompt.Objective: Generate a professional, engaging newsletter by synthesizing user-provided input and structured notes from another AI agent that processed an article. Prioritize clarity, coherence, and alignment with the user's tone/style preferences.

AgentNotes.ArticleSummary: [AI agent's condensed summary of source article]

NewsletterContentRequirements.Title: Create a catchy headline incorporating the main topic and user's tone

Structure.SummarySection: Paraphrase key agent notes while connecting to user priorities
Structure.KeyPoints: Convert prioritized points into 3-5 bullet items with brief explanations
Structure.Quotes: Include 1-2 attributed quotes if relevant to user's focus areas
Structure.Closing: Call-to-action, follow-up items, or discussion prompts

NewsletterPrompt.AdditionalInstructions:
1. Maintain consistent tense and perspective throughout
2. Hyperlink references to original sources
3. Use placeholders [User's Name] and [Date]
4. Omit sections marked in <SectionsToExclude>
5. Prioritize user-provided key points over agent notes when conflicts occur
